conversation.message: Nursery_A is our absolute first choice. We are deeply impressed by your curriculum and environment, and we strongly believe it is the perfect fit for our child. We formally submit our application for the available position.

Parent A's Rank 1 is Nursery_B.
Parent C's Rank 1 is Nursery_C.
Parent D's Rank 1 is Nursery_D.
